name: Run
shortContent: Make a run move. +20 WS to melee attacks and -20 BS to shooting attacks against you until your next turn.
content:
The active character runs, covering a distance equal to his Run
Movement (see Table 7–4: Movement in Metres/Round on
page 205). This makes the character harder to hit with ranged
weapons, but easier prey for melee attacks. Until the beginning of
the character’s next turn, ranged attacks made against him suffer a
–20 penalty to Ballistic Skill Tests, but melee attacks gain a +20
bonus to Weapon Skill Tests.
